attributes.action: stop paying more csa due to gettin child tax credits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a mother of 2 boys my husband pays for another child that he has no rights to because he never married the childs mother.i am wanting to get the law changed in payments made because my child tax credit get taken into accout to me i get child tax for my kids but i get so much of my child tax credit taken from my kids to give to some one els that claims it i feel this is wrong this should not happen if they can not take my wage into account for the payment they should not take my kids child credit also if we had another child they will take more money from us this should not happen the father should pay and just the father not any 1 in the new family the father has started a new life with just take the money out the fathers wage not any other monay that comes into the house hold
